Uses of Class
co.paralleluniverse.galaxy.StoreTransaction

  • Packages that use StoreTransaction 
    Package Description
    co.paralleluniverse.galaxy  

    • Uses of StoreTransaction in co.paralleluniverse.galaxy

      Methods in co.paralleluniverse.galaxy that return StoreTransaction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StoreTransaction Store.beginTransaction()
      Creates a new transaction.
      Methods in co.paralleluniverse.galaxy with parameters of type StoreTransaction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Store.abort(StoreTransaction txn)
      Ends a transaction after a failure.
      long Store.alloc(int count, StoreTransaction txn)
      Allocates one or more new (and empty) items in the store.

      When allocating a single item, it's better to use put(), but some data structures might require allocating an array of items.
      void Store.commit(StoreTransaction txn)
      Ends a transaction, and makes all updates visible by all other nodes in the cluster.
      void Store.del(long id, StoreTransaction txn)
      Deletes an item from the store.
      long Store.getRoot(String rootName, StoreTransaction txn)
      Gets or possibly creates a root data item.
      void Store.gets(long id, Persistable object, StoreTransaction txn)
      Retrieves a given data item into a Persistable, and pins the shared (cached) instance to this node.
      void Store.gets(long id, short nodeHint, Persistable object, StoreTransaction txn)
      Retrieves a given data item into a Persistable with a hint as to its owner in the cluster, and pins the shared (cached) instance to this node.
      byte[] Store.gets(long id, short nodeHint, StoreTransaction txn)
      Retrieves a given data item with a hint as to its owner in the cluster, and pins the shared (cached) instance to this node.
